ELFEN
  • ELFEN - Efficient Linguistic Feature Extraction for Natural Language Datasets
  • View page source

ELFEN - Efficient Linguistic Feature Extraction for Natural Language DatasetsÔÉÅ

ELFEN (Efficient Linguistic Feature Extraction for Natural Language Datasets) is a Python package that provides a set of tools for extracting linguistic features from text datasets. It provides an extensive set of features that can be used to analyze text data and NLP model outputs. Since it is built on top of the modern dataframe package polars, it is able to handle large datasets efficiently. Preprocessing backbones are built on top of the popular NLP libraries spaCy and stanza, allowing for the use of both light-weight and state-of-the-art NLP models for feature extraction in various Languages.

Note

The package is still under development. If you encounter any issues or have any suggestions, please feel free to open an issue or add a pull request on the GitHub repository.
